abstract: BlogTalkRadio, a site that allows users to create free talk radio podcasts and listen to talk radio shows, has landed $1.9 million in a second round of funding, TechCrunch reported.
snippet: BlogTalkRadio, a site that allows users to create free talk radio podcasts and listen to talk radio shows, has landed $1.9 million in a second round of funding, TechCrunch reported.
lead_paragraph: BlogTalkRadio, a site that allows users to create free talk radio podcasts and listen to talk radio shows, has landed $1.9 million in a second round of funding, TechCrunch reported.
